name: Sad Flashlight
description:
This game was created in an hour. It follows the travels of a  small flashlight as it explores its empty world.

Controls:

Jump: W, Up Arrow, Space

Left: A, Left Arrow

Right: D, Right Arrow

Credits:

Flashlight:  Unity Asset Store ( RRFreelance / PiXelBurner)

Background-Music:  Quantum Jazz (Free Music Archive)

Hit sound effect: InspectorJ. Door, Wooden, Close (freesound)
